name: Don't Shoot Yourself
description:
PLAY THE GAME IN FULLSCREEN.

If it is not working there is a Windows executable below that can be downloaded.

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/47/dont-shoot-yourself

Controls:

WASD or Arrow Keys to move.
Left Click or SPACE to shoot.
Right Click or SHIFT to boost.
Use the mouse to aim.

Programmers: Austin Leach & Maxwell Schwartz
Artwork: Maxwell Schwartz Music and Sound: Noah Wise
